description: This file defines a Fragment named CartFragment for an Android application, responsible for displaying and managing a shopping cart UI, including items, totals, and promo code application.

classes.name: CartFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment managing the shopping cart UI, including list of items, promo code input, totals display, and checkout button.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the adapter with callbacks for cart item modifications.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up RecyclerView, UI components, and observers for cart data, promo codes, and totals.

methods.name: openEditOptions
methods.description: Opens a bottom sheet to edit item options if available.

methods.name: renderTotals
methods.description: Updates the UI elements to display the current cart totals.
